EmailTemplate.subject: Going to the NHEDA Conference April 11-13?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
2012 New Hampshire Emergency Dispatcher's Association Conference April 11-13, 2012 | North Conway, New Hampshire
Stop by for a visit at the 2012 New Hampshire Emergency Dispatcher’s Association Conference on April 11-13 and find out why TriTech is the largest public safety solution provider in America with more than 2,600 clients.
If you would like to pre-schedule a demonstration of our CAD, Mobile Data, Civil Process, Corrections or Records Management solutions, please call or email us today.
Mark Baranowski, Customer Account Manager Phone: 774-551-9180 Mark.Baranowski@TriTech.com
Hope to see you there! Check out the latest TriTech news here
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121
